parameters.Price2014: Zillow price estimate from 2014 (in thousands of dollars)
parameters.Price2007: Zillow price estimate from 2007 (in thousands of dollars)
parameters.PctChange: Percentage change from adjusted 1998 price to 2014 (value of zero means no change)
parameters.Price2011: Zillow price estimate from 2011 (in thousands of dollars)
parameters.AcreGroup: Lot size groups (<= 1/4 acre or > 1/4 acre)
parameters.SquareFeet: Square footage of interior finished space (in thousands of sf)
parameters.Distance: Distance (in feet) to the nearest entry point to the rail trail network
parameters.Price1998: Zillow 10 year estimate from 2008 (in thousands of dollars)
parameters.DistGroup: Distance groups, compared to 1/2 mile (Closer or Farther Away)
parameters.Acre: Lot size for the house (in acres)
parameters.Diff2014: Difference in price between 2014 estimate and adjusted 1998 estimate (in thousands of dollars)
parameters.NumHalfBaths: Number of half baths (no shower or bathtub)
parameters.BikeScore: Bike friendliness (0-100 score, higher scores are better)
parameters.NumFullBaths: Number of full baths (includes shower or bathtub)
parameters.BedGroup: Bedroom groups (1-2 beds, 3 beds, or 4+ beds)
parameters.WalkScore: Walk friendliness (0-100 score, higher scores are better)

reference: This dataset comprises 104 homes in Northampton, MA that were sold in 2007. The authors measured the shortest distance from each home to a railtrail on streets and pathways with Google maps and recorded the Zillow.com estimate of each home's price in 1998 and 2011. Additional attributes such as square footage, number of bedrooms and number of bathrooms are available from a realty database from 2007. We divide the houses into two groups based on distance to the trail (DistGroup).
usage: A data frame with 104 observations on the following 30 variables.
title: Homes in Northampton MA Near Rail Trails
description:
Description
Sample of homes in Northampton, MA to see whether being close to a bike trail enhances the value of the home
